title: Steel Legion Lux Skin Broken
body:
After selecting Steel Legion Lux at champion selection screen and the match starts, the skin goes back to the default one.

Similar to when you don't own the skin. however i do own it. and cannot play with it for some reason or another.

Any suggestions?



Played this match http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/70227499/200216696?tab=overview
However i don't think it tells you what skin im using. Fun match though.

replies.body: Pretty sure this is a bug/glitch with multiple skins (possibly all of them) but doesn't seem to pop up very often. Yesterday my friend tried using Armor Of The Fifth Age Taric and it went back to default.
Because the Game knows that, that skin is..... Outrageous

They only way to fix it is to uninstall. 

And never install the game ever again.
This happened with Galactic Renekton for me. Have you tried selecting the skin, then selecting default then back to the skin you want?
